## MapView.pointOfView property

Gets the optional camera used to render the scene.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get pointOfView(): THREE.PerspectiveCamera | undefined;

set pointOfView(pointOfView: THREE.PerspectiveCamera | undefined);
```
